cockatrice_carddatabase.cards:
Praise the Sun MHLW W 1W 2 Sorcery 3 Join Forces — Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player distributes X +1/+1 counters among any number of creatures they control, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.
Thief's Journey MHLW U U 1 Sorcery 3 Join forces — Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Starting with the next opponent in turn order, each player gains control of a permanent of their choice with converted mana cost X or less, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.
Asylum Persecutor MHLW B 5BB 7 Creature - Demon 7/7 2 Flying, trample Join forces — At the beginning of your upkeep, each player starting with you may pay any amount of mana. Each player loses 10 minus X life, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.
Soul Burning MHLW R R 1 Sorcery 3 Join forces — Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player exiles the top X cards of their library, where X is the total amount of mana spent this way. Each player may cast cards they exiled this way until the end of their next turn.
Legacy of Sif MHLW G 1G 2 Sorcery 3 Join forces — Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player creates X 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.
Alvina, Hunt-Mother MHLW UG 2GU 4 Legendary Creature - Cat Advisor 3/3 2 Flash Whenever an opponent is dealt 5 or more damage, each player other than that player draws a card. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Artorias, the Wolf Knight MHLW WG 3GW 5 Legendary Creature - Demigod Knight 4/7 2 If a source would deal damage to a creature other than Artorias, the Wolf Knight, you may have that damage be dealt to Artorias instead. If you do, you gain that much life. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Big Hat Logan MHLW UR 2UR 4 Legendary Creature - Human Wizard 3/3 2 At the beginning of your upkeep, put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast a noncreature card put into your graveyard this way. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Black Iron Tarkus MHLW WB 2WB 4 Legendary Creature - Human Knight 4/4 2 Whenever a creature leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Black Iron Tarkus. Remove two +1/+1 counters from Tarkus: It gains indestructible until end of turn. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Dusk, Princess of Oolacile MHLW UG GU 2 Legendary Creature - Human Wizard 0/3 2 Defender At the beginning of combat on each player’s turn, you may pay 2. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature that player controls. That creature can’t be blocked this turn. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
The Fair Lady MHLW BG 1BG 3 Legendary Creature - Spider Demon 2/3 2 Reach Whenever a nontoken creature dies, you may pay 2 life. If you do, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Kalameet, Abyss Dragon MHLW BR 3BR 5 Legendary Creature - Dragon 4/4 2 Flying If another source would deal damage to an opponent, it instead deals twice that much damage. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Lady of the Darkling MHLW UB 1UB 3 Legendary Creature - Human Knight 2/4 2 Lifelink At the beginning of your end step, if a creature died this turn, scry 2. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Laurentius, Humble Pupil MHLW RG 1RG 3 Legendary Creature - Human Shaman 2/2 2 Spells you cast that target creatures cost 2 less to cast. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Ornstein, Tester of Mortals MHLW WR 3RW 5 Legendary Creature - Demigod Knight 4/4 2 Vigilance, haste Whenever one or more creatures with power 2 or less block, Ornstein, Tester of Mortals deals 4 damage to each player. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Petrus, False Friend MHLW WB WB 2 Legendary Creature - Human Cleric 2/2 2 Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Pinwheel, Masked Cabal MHLW UB 2UB 4 Legendary Creature - Horror Wizard 4/2 2 Whenever Pinwheel, Masked Cabal attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, create two 2/2 blue Illusion creature tokens with “When this creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it.” Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Priscilla, Cross-Breed MHLW WU 2WU 4 Legendary Creature - Demigod Cleric 3/3 2 Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Priscilla, Cross-Breed. It gains lifelink and hexproof until end of turn. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Quelaag, Chaos Witch MHLW BR 1BR 3 Legendary Creature - Spider Demon 2/4 2 Menace Whenever Quelaag, Chaos Witch attacks, it deals damage equal to its power to an opponent chosen at random. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Quelana, Mother of Fire MHLW RG 2RG 4 Legendary Creature - Human Shaman 3/3 2 T: Add RR. T, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 red and green Shaman creature token with “T: Add R.” Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Sieglinde, Leal Daughter MHLW WU 1WU 3 Legendary Creature - Human Knight 2/4 2 Whenever Sieglinde, Leal Daughter deals combat damage to a player, return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Siegmeyer, Errant Ally MHLW UR UR 2 Legendary Creature - Human Knight 3/3 2 At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose an opponent at random. Siegmeyer, Errant Ally attacks that player this combat if able. Whenever Siegmeyer deals combat damage to that player this turn, draw a card. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Sif, Great Grey Wolf MHLW WG 2GW 4 Legendary Creature - Wolf 5/4 2 Vigilance Equip abilities you activate cost 3 less to activate. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Smough, Grisly Executioner MHLW BG 2BG 4 Legendary Creature - Human Warrior 5/5 2 Menace Smough, Grisly Executioner must be blocked by two or more creatures if able. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
Solaire, Seeker of Sunlight MHLW WR 1RW 3 Legendary Creature - Human Knight 3/3 2 Whenever Solaire, Seeker of Sunlight and exactly one other creature attack, they each gain double strike until end of turn. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)
